text:
December 20* 1940
Mr. M. S' Novik
Radio Station WNYC
Municipal Broadcasting Sy|tem
New York City
Dear Novik:
It mas been suggested that you write Senator
Wagner to seek his endorsement or President
Arthur G. Crane to till the present F.C.C. vacancy*
I passed the suggestions along to you in case you
WISH TO TAKE ANY ACTION. HOLIDAY GREETINGS.
Cordially*
Frank E. Schooley
FESsrmw
